}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Destroys the coroutine state of the coroutine to which {{c|*this}} refers, or does nothing if the coroutine is a no-op coroutine.

@2@ Does nothing.

The behavior is undefined if destroying is needed and {{c|*this}} does not refer to a suspended coroutine.

(none)
